name: it's just a door
description:
Use doors to get around and solve puzzles in a strange digital atmosphere. This game was created during the 101HoursJam.

EPILEPSY WARNING! Features a lot of flashing lights!

WASD - move

SPACE - jump

R - reset position

Esc - pause

UPDATE:

- added instructions as you go along with the puzzles

- fixed triggers not working

Known issues:

- doors sometimes spawn you facing the wrong direction

ANY comments are welcomed.

Started with the FPS example project provided with UE4. 

I used a door frame from the UE4 starter content and just cubes and spheres for all the rest. Music is created by me and credits to portal scripting go to all UE4 tutorials on this matter.
